title: How do I add a bookmark in the built-in web browser
answer:
For EMUI 2.3, open the options menu from the Browser screen, select Save to bookmarks and then enter the name and URL of the bookmark. 

 For EMUI 3.0, open the Menu from the Browser screen and select Bookmarks & history. From the browsing history, touch and hold the page to be bookmarked and select Save to bookmarks from the pop-up menu.
keywords: add bookmarks, Internet Explorer, browser, bookmarks, save bookmarks, preloaded browser
